section.name: Depot Command Line
section.source: Usage: build [-list -select <pattern> -consumers | -select <pattern> -consumers -verbose -plugin <artifact> -version <version> -D<property>=<value> <target1> [<target2> ...] | -help] options -list -select -consumers -list (-l) List project info. -select (-s) <pattern> Select target project(s). -consumers (-c) Select consumers. -select -consumers -verbose -plugin -version -select (-s) <pattern> Select target project(s). -consumers (-c) Select consumers. -verbose (-v) Enable verbose mode. -plugin <artifact> Default builder plugin uri. -version <version> Build output artifact version -D<property>=<value> Set property values. <target> [<target> ...] -help (-h) List command help.
